info.title: Bank Account Contract Overview Retrieval
info.description:
A retrieval view for an overview on bank account contracts of type current account contract, deposit account contract, and loan contract. 
You can use this API in scenarios where a list of bank account contracts for a party (account holder, borrower) with basic data shall be displayed. If additional data is required, use the retrieve service of the respective bank account contract type (for example, current account contract). Bank Account Contract Overview Retrieval covers only the bank account contracts in one system.

Comments:
The retrieval view contains data for the current date that are required for an overview of bank account contracts. Bank Account Contract is a contract between a credit institute and customer, which is based on the customer's request for opening a bank account and consists among others, the bank account type, account holder, general terms and conditions.

Remark:
A prerequisite of the API is that business partner data is available in same system as the bank account contracts. The API queries data for the current date of a bank account contract. The service Bank Account Contract Overview Retrieval is assigned to service group Transactional Banking.

General:
The properties of the EDM that are based on a code GDT do not contain supplementary components (e.g. listID) that are known from the GDTs of the enterprise services.

x-sap-shortText: Query an overview of bank account contracts of type current account, deposit account, and loan account using this synchronous inbound service

UUID.title: A UUID is a universal unique identifier of a bank account.
UUID.description: Remark: The BankAccountUUID is required for the performant read of a bank account related entity because BankAccountUUID corresponds to CONTRACT_INT which is part of the primary index of the database table. GDT: NOSC_UUID

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccount.v000.title: Bank Account
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccount.v000.description:
A Bank Account is an account that holds funds in a bank and is subject to deposits and withdrawals.Remark: 
 Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. 
 Integrity Conditions: 
 The following combinations of properties for filtering are allowed: 
 a.) by Bank Account ID 
 - ID (mandatory) 
 - CurrencyCode (optional) 
 - BankRoutingID (optional) 
 - BankCountryCode (optional) 
 No other filter attributes are allowed. 
 b.) by Bank Account Standard ID 
 - StandardID (mandatory) 
 - CurrencyCode (optional) 
 c.) by BankAccountContractUUID 
 - BankAccountContractUUID (mandatory) 
 d.) by Bank Account Contract ID 
 - BankAccountContractID (mandatory)

ID.title: Is an identifier of a bank account contract lock request.
ID.description:
Special characters like "-", "_", "*", "/" are not allowed.
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.
Constraint: BankAccountContractUUID is not allowed as filter in case of cross-navigation (e.g. from Bank Account Contract Overview Retrieval). 
BDT: BankContractLockRequestID

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.title: Bank Account Contract Lock Request
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.description: A bank account contract lock request is a request to maintain locks on product features and transactions of bank account contract.Bank account contract is a view of a bank contract.

ID.title: A UUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account contract cancel request.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.title: Bank Account Contract Cancel Request
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.description: A Bank Account Contract Cancel Request is a request from the account holder party to the bank to cancel a current account contract or a savings account contract immediately or at a future time.

UUID.title: UUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account contract account holder change request.

com.sap.gateway.default.bacaccountholder.title: Bank Account Contract Account Holder Change Request
com.sap.gateway.default.bacaccountholder.description: A Bank Account Contract Account Holder Change Request is a request to change the account holder of a current account contract or savings account contract or time deposit contract immediately.

UUID.title: UUID is an universal unique identifier of a loan contract borrower party change request.

com.sap.gateway.default.lcborrowerpartyc.title: Loan Contract Borrower Party Change Request
com.sap.gateway.default.lcborrowerpartyc.description: A LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequest is a request to change the borrower of a loan contract immediately.

UUID.title: An universal unique identifier of a bank account contract.

com.sap.gateway.default.currentaccountco.title: Current Account Contract
com.sap.gateway.default.currentaccountco.description:
A Current Account Contract is a contract between a credit institute and customer, which is based on the customer's request for opening a bank account of type current account and consists among others, account holder, general terms and conditions.

Comment: A bank account based on a current account contract is an account that allows money to be held on behalf of the account holder

UUID.title: An universal unique identifier of a bank account contract.

com.sap.gateway.default.loancontract.v00.title: Loan Contract
com.sap.gateway.default.loancontract.v00.description:
Loan Contract is a contractual agreement between lenders and borrowers, which is based on a borrowerâ€™s request for a loan and includes, for example, loan type, borrower(s), and general terms and conditions.

Comment: A BankAccount is a bank account associated with the bank account contract. 

Integrity Condition:StartDate of TermSpecificationValidityPeriod, TermAgreementFixingPeriod, and IncomingPaymentAgreementPeriod have to be the same date. 

Constraint: Loan Contract Create - During creation of a loan contract , it is required to specify the details of Term Agreement and Inpayment Agreement.

UUID.title: An universal unique identifier of a bank account contract.

Comment: A bank account based on a time deposit contract is an account that allows money to be held on behalf of the account holder

Code.title: A coded representation of a key figure for a balance of a BankAccountContract.
Code.description:
Remark: Only the following codes are supported 
2 (Disbursement Obligation),
5 (Effective Capital),
6 (Account Balance),
10 (Available Amount),
15 (Granted Credit Limit),
18 (Adjusted Initial Loan Contract Amount).

Codes 6, 10 and 15 are returned for Type Code 874 (Current Account Contract).
Codes 6 and 10 are returned for Type Code 875 (Deposit Account Contract).
Codes 2, 5 and 18 are returned for Type Code 472 (Loan Contract).

GDT: BankAccountContractBalanceKeyFigureCode

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.title: Balance Key Figure
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.description: A BalanceKeyFigure is a key figure that describes an amount pertaining to a bank account contract at a specific point in time.

Code.title: A coded representation of a key figure for a balance of a BankAccountContract.

2 (Disbursement Obligation),
5 (Effective Capital),
6 (Account Balance),
10 (Available Amount),
15 (Granted Credit Limit),
18 (Adjusted Initial Loan Contract Amount).

Codes 6, 10 and 15 are returned for Type Code 874 (Current Account Contract).
Codes 6 and 10 are returned for Type Code 875 (Deposit Account Contract).
Codes 2, 5 and 18 are returned for Type Code 472 (Loan Contract).

GDT: BankAccountContractBalanceKeyFigureCode

ID.title: Bank account number (Basic Bank Account Number, BBAN). An account number that is assigned by the account managing bank. It uniquely identifies a bank account in most countries only together with the bank.

StandardID.title: International bank account number (International Bank Account Number, IBAN).

InternalID.title: BankAccountInternalID is a proprietary identifier for a bank account.

UUID.title: A UUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account.

CurrencyCode.title: CurrencyCode is a coded representation of the currency of the bank account.

Bank.title: Bank where the account is held.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.title: Bank Account Identifying Elements
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.description: The identifying elements of a bank account supported by bank account management in Financial Services (Banking).

ID.title: Bank account number (Basic Bank Account Number, BBAN). An account number that is assigned by the account managing bank. It uniquely identifies a bank account in most countries only together with the bank.

PartyID.title: The ID of a party (business partner).
PartyID.description:
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. Filtering only works if filter value for PartyIdentifierTypeCode is also specified. Only one filter value for (Alternative) PartyID (and PartyIdentifierTypeCode) can be specified. If filter value for (Alternative) PartyID (and PartyIdentifierTypeCode) is specified, additional filtering for PartyUUID or PartyID is not possible. 
GDT: PartyID

PartyIdentifierTypeCode.title: Type of party identification.
PartyIdentifierTypeCode.description:
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. Filtering only works if filter value for (Alternative) PartyID is also specified.
GDT: PartyIdentifierTypeCode

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.title: Party Alternative Identification
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.description: PartyAlternativeIdentification contains alternative identifications of a party (business partner).

PartyUUID.title: The UUID of a party (business partner).
PartyUUID.description:
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. Only one filter value for PartyUUID can be specified. If filter value for PartyUUID is specified, additional filtering for PartyID or AlternativePartyID is not possible.

PartyID.title: The ID of a party (business partner).
PartyID.description:
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. Only one filter value for PartyID can be specified. If filter value for PartyID is specified, additional filtering for PartyUUID or AlternativePartyID is not possible. 
GDT: PartyID

PartyAlternativeIdentification.title: PartyAlternativeIdentification contains alternative identifications of a party (business partner).
PartyAlternativeIdentification.description: Will be provided only if filter on PartyAlternativeIdentification is specified. In this case the response will contain the provided PartyAlternativeIdentification

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.title: Party Identifying Elements
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.description:
PartyIdentifyingElements does contain all identifying elements of a party (business partner). 
Remark: PartyTypeCode is value 147 (Business Partner). 
Integrity Condition: Either PartyUUID or PartyID or PartyAlternativeIdentification must be specified.

BankSalesProductID.title: A BankSalesProductID is an identifier of a BankSalesProduct.
BankSalesProductID.description: Comment: A BankSalesProduct is an intangible product that is offered and sold by a bank. The sales product describes the provision of a financial service.

ProductionControl.title: A BankAccountContractProductionControl defines the parameters that control the processing and handling in the production of a bank account contract.
ProductionControl.description: Comment: BankAccountContractProductionControl defines the contract information that controls the production of a bank account contract.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.title: Product
